meaningMnemonic: To do <kanji>loss</kanji> to something means you are doing something to make something have loss. This is <vocabulary>to harm</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to injure</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: In order <vocabulary>to harm</vocabulary> your opponent, you go way overboard. You <reading>soak</reading> (そこ) them in acid. Soaked head to toe. Too far man, too far.
